placesVisited: Bangkok, Hua Hin, Kanchanaburi, Samut Songkhram
generalInfo: Thailand’s most sought-after destination, Bangkok, is a bustling city that offers unforgettable experiences, which are best enjoyed with those closest to you. Displaying a truly unique blend of traditional authenticity and modern sophistication, it is the idyllic location for adventurous couples wishing for a luxurious and romantic getaway. On this 12-day journey of Bangkok, you and your partner will make lifelong memories as you bask in the romance of the city’s most endearing attractions and intimate locations. If you are planning a special honeymoon, commemorating a relationship milestone, or seeking passionate time away together, this customizable trip is perfectly tailored for you.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – An Idyllic Arrival
dayInfo.description: As you and your partner approach Bangkok Airport’s runway and peer out of the plane’s windows, you will witness the bustling capital of Thailand in all its glory. The cityscape will exude opulence with towering skyscrapers that reach up to the clouds. The streets will be as vibrant as ever with streams of people that are eagerly shopping colorful markets and dining at authentic food vendors. The traditional temples are eye-catching spiritual landmarks with their golden forms that majestically shimmer under the sun. You two will soon explore these significant sights, and more, on this romantic and luxurious stay in and around Bangkok. You will meet your cheerful private transfer upon touching down in the Land of Smiles. You will journey to your Bangkok home, which will be a lavish 5-star hotel in the heart of the city. From your private balcony, you will have panoramic views of the city and a cozy escape to retreat to after the adventurous days. You can spend the afternoon acclimating yourselves to the bustling Bangkok energy before you make your way to one of the city’s leading, local restaurants. You will enjoy a gourmet dinner with a view as you witness the sun slowly dip down behind the cityscape and bring the idyllic day to a close.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – The Country's Rich Culture
dayInfo.description: With so many appealing attractions to explore, your second day in Bangkok will be designed to give you and your partner a completely immersive cultural experience. You will wake feeling refreshed after a peaceful night's rest, eager to spend the day together discovering Thailand’s rich heritage. You will enjoy an exquisite breakfast by the pool before hopping in your private transfer and jetting off for an adventure. On this day, you will awaken with a deep admiration for the country’s culture. Visits to the pivotal points of interest around the city will be utterly inspiring. The Jim Thompson House, a commemoration to an American man who re-established the Thai silk industry and introduced it to the leading European fashion houses, represents the pinnacle of Western-influenced, Southeast Asian design. After this, you will discover an immense collection of ancient artifacts and art at Thailand’s original national museum. Then, you will delve into the modern Southeast Asian art scene with a tour of Bangkok’s finest contemporary art museum. Each captivating location will offer a unique experience in which you and your partner will truly delight. In the evening, you will be whisked into the sky for fine-dining at one of Bangkok’s premier rooftop bars. Here, you can tuck into exceptional Thai cuisine and sip away on elegant cocktails while you appreciate the sweeping 360-degree view of the city.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Old-World Charm
dayInfo.description: On your third day, you will awaken your senses with a beautifully prepared breakfast at a prime café that is located on the Chao Phraya River banks. This charming start to the morning will give you and your partner time to connect and reminisce about the adventures that you have had and those that are yet to come. After the delicious breakfast spread, you will head back to your hotel to meet your private walking temple tour guide. Today, you will visit the awe-inspiring age-old temples of Thailand and learn more about the country’s extraordinary history. You will stroll through the streets of Bangkok, passing many multi-colored markets along the way. Some of them will release tantalizing aromas into the air, drawing hungry travelers to their stalls, while others will boast an assortment of intricate trinkets and alluring gems. You will encounter smiling faces with each turn of your heads at these spirited markets. You will continue your walk until you reach one of the most significant temples in Thailand. Shortly after arriving at Wat Pho, your first destination, you will marvel at the majesty of its 150 foot golden Reclining Buddha. After this, you will visit more magnificent temples that each have their own distinct design and striking presence. You will transfer back to your hotel before connecting with Bangkok’s luxurious Chao Phraya River cruise. You will spend the evening gliding along the river, viewing Bangkok by boat. As you do, you will enjoy a multiple-course haute cuisine meal by candlelight. As the sun fades and the moon shines, this fine-dining river cruise will epitomize romance in Bangkok.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – The Endearing Outdoors
dayInfo.description: There are many ways to see Bangkok, but one of the most endearing for couples is by bicycle. Rather than maneuvering around the busy city, you will transfer to Bang Krachaofor a romantic escape to the lush, urban oasis. Full of incredible wildlife and cocooned by stunning plant life, the artificial island will seemingly transport you out of the city and into a rainforest setting. Together, you will delight in scenic rides along the winding trails, feed fishes in the ponds, and round off the picture-perfect morning with a light picnic in the green forest. Before returning to your hotel, you will transfer to a beautiful Bangkok treehouse near Bang Krachao for an afternoon cocktail and snack amongst the thick foliage. Then, you will journey back to your room to relax and lounge around the pool. In the evening, you will visit a remarkable restaurant in the city for a Michelin Star meal. The award-winning chef and his experienced team will prepare one of the most elegant and exquisite dishes you have yet to experience. The luxuriously intimate dining experience will end off a picturesque day within nature.

dayInfo.title: Hua Hin – An Intimate Retreat
dayInfo.description: On the fifth day of your trip, you will make your way out of the city and travel to the fashionable seaside town, Hua Hin. The diverse destination will be a surreal blend of cosmopolitan and tropical living, and it will boast an array of lively markets that sell divine, freshly caught seafood in addition to a beautiful stretch of white sand beach where you will soak up the sun in style. Upon arrival, you will check-in to your exquisite suite that overlooks the ocean. The turquoise sea will welcome you with warm waters if you wish to take a quick dip. Shortly thereafter, you will transfer to a premier wellness resort. Here, you and your partner will be spoiled with an assortment of spa treatments of your choosing. This day will be dedicated to refreshing your minds and bodies through carefully curated, holistic health therapies. Enjoying it together will be all the more rewarding. Later this day, you will return to your hotel for an afternoon under the sun, and venture to a vibrant night market for authentic Thai dinner after witnessing the stunning seaside sunset.

dayInfo.title: Hua Hin – Captivating Coral Reefs
dayInfo.description: Rarely do couples get to experience exquisite island-style living when visiting Bangkok. However, from Hua Hin, you and your loved one will have the incredible opportunity to visit the wonderful island of Koh Talu. After breakfast, you will transfer to the island via a short speedboat trip. You can let your hair down in the wind as you are whisked away to paradise for the day. Koh Talu is renowned for its crystal-clear waters, which give swimmers an uninterrupted view of the brightly illuminated coral reefs. After arriving, you will dive into one of Thailand’s most pristine snorkeling experiences where you will have the opportunity to view all sorts of wondrous sea life as you wade through the warm, turquoise waters. You will return to the uncrowded shores for an intimate lunch on the island. Here, you will capture unforgettable memories and stunning scenic views. Later today, you will transfer to your hotel in Hua Hin for one last enchanting seaside supper and sunset.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Afternoon Tea in Style
dayInfo.description: The unique tropical getaway will leave you two feeling refreshed and ready to discover more of Bangkok. On day seven, your private transfer will take you to the city where you will check-in to a 5-star hotel on the banks of the Chao Phraya River. The luxurious and comfortable suite will offer unparalleled views of your surroundings. This day, you will appreciate an admirable Afternoon tea at Bangkok’s elite hotel. Here, at the turn-of-the-century style lounge, which has hosted prominent celebrities and dignitaries, you and your partner will spend a few hours in complete bliss. The selection of delightful, traditional teas and treats that are accompanied by the lounge’s period charm will keep you thoroughly enthused. After the fabulous tea, you will return to your hotel for an evening at your leisure. You can enjoy fine dining at award-winning restaurants nearby or visit an authentic market for traditional Thai cuisine before a rewarding sleep.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Indulge All of Your Senses
dayInfo.description: Thailand is exceptionally well known for its incredible cuisine. Years of tradition and meticulous attention to detail will culminate in masterfully crafted Thai dishes, which entice each of the five taste categories. On the eighth day of your trip, you will further your knowledge about their authentic meals and try your hands at preparing a few famous dishes. You will begin the day with a street food tour, and you will have no doubt relished in the gourmet dining experiences, but street food is as authentic as it gets in Bangkok. These meals will be age-old recipes that highlight the distinct craft of traditional Thai cuisine. On this tour, every sense will be invigorated as you taste your way through Thailand. After the mouthwatering journey, you will venture to one of Bangkok’s prestigious culinary schools. Hosted by experienced chefs and set inside a stylishly designed building, this intimate cooking class will uncover the secrets behind a few of Thailand’s most coveted meals. After fine-tuning your culinary expertise, you will make your way to an animal cafe. Popularized in the Southeast, animal cafes allow patrons to play with all sorts of spirited creatures as you sip on your beverages. Bangkok boasts an array of exciting animal cafes, each with its own species specialty. Whether you wish to meet huskies, bunnies, cats, or foxes, the animal cafes will add a joyous touch to your memorable trip.

dayInfo.title: Kanchanaburi – Whisked Away to Paradise
dayInfo.description: On day nine of your trip, you will check-out of your hotel on the Chao Phraya River and meet your private transfer who will take you to the train station in Bangkok. Here, you will board the train and make your way through the scenic Bangkok surroundings on your way to the popular destination, Kanchanaburi. The ride will be comfortable, and from your cabin, you will have picturesque views of the rice paddies, sugar cane fields, and pineapple plantations. You can snap up the idyllic moments as you approach your stop. You will transfer to an immaculate hotel that is situated along the bends of the River Kwai. The luxurious hotel features intimate rooms that float above the water. Surrounded by the lush greenery of the river banks, you will relax in style with only the sounds of nature around you. You will dine on exquisite dishes in the evening before unwinding in your private room or soaking up the setting from your riverside balcony. You will be enchanted by the beautiful, romantic views from this incredibly comfortable location.

dayInfo.title: Kanchanaburi – Discovering Mon Culture
dayInfo.description: There is a wealth of history to discover in the Kanchanaburi area. On this day, you will transfer to the destinations with the most significant points of interest where you will gain in-depth insight into Thailand’s wartime past. You will venture to an intriguing war cemetery and museum before exploring the famous Death Railway. The immersive trip will instill feelings of sincere gratitude within you. In the afternoon, you will explore Thailand’s Mon culture with a tugboat trip to a local tribe village where you will gain an introspective understanding of the lives of rural Thai villagers as you witness traditional dance ceremonies and timeless cultural practices. You will return to your hotel later today for an exceptional Thai meal under the setting sun.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – Markets like No Other
dayInfo.description: You will transfer back to Bangkok via train after a romantic getaway on the River Kwai and a riveting exploration of traditional Thailand. You will arrive at the hotel where your journey began in the heart of the city of Bangkok. Now familiar with bustling Bangkok, you will have found your bearings. Today, you will experience one last significant adventure before you depart for home. After check-in, you will meet your private transfer and journey to Samut Songkhram. Here, just over an hour from Bangkok, you will visit the Maeklong Railway Market and a nearby floating market. The famous railway market is an incredibly unique experience in which vendors position their stalls right on the train tracks. As the train approaches, the vendors will quickly move their stalls out of its way, and after it passes, they reposition their awnings. It will be a riveting thing to watch and one that you two will truly enjoy. After browsing the rich selection of products and enjoying local eats, you will transfer to a floating market that is just a few minutes away. You can hop on a long-tailed boat and glide along the canals as you jump off to view odds and ends that the locals offer. After experiencing the rush of these diverse markets, you will transfer back to Bangkok where you will enjoy one last divine gourmet meal by moonlight as you look out over the city from the great heights of an exclusive rooftop bar.

dayInfo.title: Bangkok – One Last Day
dayInfo.description: Once you rise from bed after a peaceful night’s sleep, you will wish that you had a few more nights in this exuberant city. Looking back at the luxurious and romantic Thai getaway, you will delight in the beautiful moments that you have shared and yearn for an extension to your trip. Sit back comfortably as you enjoy an intimate breakfast with one another, taking in the views of the enchanting cityscape. You will return to your room and pack your things before checking out and meeting your private transfer in the lobby. Finally, you will fly off into the sky with spectacular memories that you will never forget.
